dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Zargan.com for seslisozluk.com
dmca.body:
Please re-open the case in question. Thanks.


-----Original Message-----
From: Orhan Bilgin (Banguoglu Ltd.) [mailto:obilgin@banguoglu.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2006 4:50 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint from Zargan.com for seslisozluk.com


Unfortunately it is technically impossible to provide a complete URL
list, since there are more than 200.000 URLs which are infringing on our
copyright.

We have sent you a third infringement notice by registered mail,
yesterday. 
The notice contains the printed version of the dictionary (two volumes)
whose copyright is being infringed upon.

Just to facilitate the process, please find attached the scanned first
page of the dictionary whose worldwide, exclusive online publication
rights we hold until 2011.

Below is a list of the infringing URLs, taken from the DICTIONARY'S
FIRST PAGE ONLY.

Since the notification we have sent you yesterday contains a sample of
the entire printed dictionary, we hope that the infringer will now have
to actually remove all entries it has illegally obtained from that
copyrighted work.

Please advise us of any further steps we can take in accordance with
your copyright policy.

Yours truly,

Orhan Bilgin
www.zargan.com


      Entry in the Licensed Content
     Alleged Infringer's Results Page

     http://seslisozluk.com/?word=a

----- Original Message -----
From: "Legal Response" <legalresponse@theplanet.com>
To: "Orhan Bilgin (Banguoglu Ltd.)" <obilgin@banguoglu.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2006 10:55 PM
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Zargan.com for seslisozluk.com


Please provide us with the specific URL which is infringing upon your
copyright.

Thank you,

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Orhan Bilgin (Banguoglu Ltd.) [mailto:obilgin@banguoglu.com]
Sent: Monday, December 11, 2006 2:04 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint from Zargan.com for seslisozluk.com

To whom it may concern,

Except for the few entries we have submitted to you by way of an example
in our complaint, the infringing website www.seslisozluk.com has NOT
removed any of the content it has illegally obtained from our website
and we are incurring significant losses due to this continuing
infringement.

What can we do about this misrepresentation within the context of your
copyright policy?

Orhan Bilgin
www.zargan.com


----- Original Message -----
From: <legal-response@theplanet.com>
To: <obilgin@banguoglu.com>; <copyright@theplanet.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 07, 2006 9:49 PM
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Zargan.com for seslisozluk.com


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
>
> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
>
>
>
> ---------
>
>
> Please see the attached PDF.
